title: High Ping
body: For some reason today my ping has been really bad. It will say  I only have 70 ping but i will be disconnecting every few seconds and it will feel as if I have 1000 ping. My ping is fine in everything else but league of legends. I have charter.

replies.body: Having sudden lag spikes with input delays in addition to disconnections suggests that your network is having problems maintaining a connection to the game server.  I suggest running a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) for those specific matches to find out what's going wrong.  The results will also offer some resolutions steps for you to get this fixed up.  Let me know if you have any questions!
